synopsis.text: Jad Dove, a valiant warrior, single-handedly vanquishes the formidable Demon King and his minions, marking an end to the relentless war and ushering in an era of tranquility in the kingdom of Cartland. However, his dreams of a hero's life are shattered when he finds himself jobless and aimless in the aftermath of his triumph. Seeking solace in the world of anime and video games, he embraces the life of a NEET, only to find himself entangled in ancient legends, curses, and a convoluted plot involving multiple kingdoms and fearsome dragons. Despite the chaos, Jad remains steadfast on his unconventional path, even finding camaraderie among the most unlikely allies. As he navigates through these challenges, he uncovers the hidden truths of the Cartland Kingdom, proving that the life of a hero is never truly over.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
